name: Perfect Search Media
description:
Perfect Search Media is a full-service digital marketing agency located in Chicago, Illinois. 
We’re experts in Search and Social Media Advertising, SEO, Remarketing, Display, A/B Testing, Design, and Content—with an emphasis on mobile. Plus, we’re all about training the best digital marketing minds in town.
Our services encompass what we describe as our 5 (T)s: Technology, Tracking, Testing, Transparency and most importantly, Team.
At Perfect Search, we strive to reflect our core values every day. Our team is committed to taking initiative, being passionate, having fun, valuing teamwork and ensuring growth.
